Installation

  1. Install pipewire:

    # xbps-install pipewire elogind

  2. Configure services:

    # rm /etc/sv/dbus/down
# ln -s /etc/sv/dbus/ /var/service/
# rm /etc/sv/elogind/down
# ln -s /etc/sv/elogind/ /var/service/
# reboot

Configuration

  1. Start pipewire (as user):

    $ pipewire 2> /dev/null &
